item.description:
Hi - despite the bumps in plans I hope you guys are still looking forward to Saturday. I hope these slight changes don't discourage you all. I just don't want to see anyone turned away because I didn't know.

  • Car pooling is encouraged
  • Try to see if you can book your lesson before Saturday
  • Poll results will determine the time of day we formally meet and if lesson times allow we will meet up again if people are up for it

More details here:
WACHUSETT MOUNTAIN
item.why: Who knows you may even meet a cute ski partner to buddy up with
item.name: Ski Day and Apres Ski party :Beginners welcome and ENCOURAGED!
